**M.Sc. Robotics** @ Northeastern University

**Machine Learning Co-op** @ Skyworks Solutions - Built Data Viz. and ML pipelines for RF power amplifier design automation

## ðŸ”§ Tech Stack
- **Languages:** C/C++, Python, Rust, Java, TypeScript, SQL
- **ML/AI:** PyTorch, Scikit-learn, OpenCV, OpenAI Gym
- **Data Viz.:** Pandas, Matplotlib, Plotly
- **Tools:** Docker, Git, Linux
- **Cloud:** Google Cloud (BigQuery, Cloud VM, Storage, Firebase), Microsoft Azure (DevOps, Compute VM)

## ðŸŒŸ Highlights
- Currently working on LLM for generating Verilog code.
- Created [NDim](https://crates.io/crates/ndim) - High-performance Rust library for scientific computing (3,400+ downloads)
- Developed RL algorithms for endoscopic brain tumor detection @ Embedded Systems Lab
- Built Data Viz. and ML pipeline - projected to reduce simulation time by 78% and save $150K+ annually in license costs
- Published research on [RF amplifier design acceleration](https://arxiv.org/abs/2507.11928) and [IoT-enabled robotic systems](https://ieeexplore.ieee.org/document/10263943)
